rOda#sI apRuNAqjjAya#mAnaH | 
vIqDuM ciqdadri#maBinat parAqyan janAq yadaqgnimaya#jantaq pa~jca# || 
SrIqNAmu#dAqrO dhaqruNO# rayIqNAM ma#nIqShANAqM prArpa#NaqH sOma#gOpAH | 
vasO$H sUqnuH saha#sO aqPsu rAjAq vi BAqtyagra# uqShasA#midhAqnaH || 
yastE# aqdya kRuqNava#d-BadraSOcE&pUqpaM dE#va GRuqtava#ntamagnE | 
prataM na#ya prataqrAM ~MvasyOq acCAqBi dyuqmnaM dEqvaBa#ktaM ~MyaviShTha ||
